examples: Alan Shearer finished among the top ten goal scorers in 10 out of his 14 seasons in the Premier League and won the top scorer title three times..

definitions.definition: One who keeps track of scores in a game; a scorekeeper .
examples: The team was making goals so fast the scorer could barely keep up.

definitions.definition: Either of a pair of people, one provided by each side, who record in a specially formatted book, every ball bowled, every run scored, and every wicket that falls

secondary_definitions: One who keeps track of scores in a game; a scorekeeper .
( cricket ) Either of a pair of people, one provided by each side, who record in a specially formatted book, every ball bowled, every run scored, and every wicket that falls
